meta_title: Turnaround Time (TAT) in Maintenance: The 2026 Efficiency Guide
meta_description: 70% of unplanned downtime costs stem from poor Turnaround Time management. Learn the definitive calculation, STO strategies, and how Factory AI reduces TAT by
title: Turnaround Time: The Definitive Guide to Reducing Maintenance Delays and STO Costs

hero_image.alt: Hero image for Turnaround Time: The Definitive Guide to Reducing Maintenance Delays and STO Costs

image_prompt: A photo-realistic, cinematic wide shot inside a modern but active "brownfield" manufacturing plant. The lighting is a mix of natural light from high windows and industrial LED lighting. In the foreground, a diverse group of maintenance professionals (men and women of various ethnicities) are gathered around a large industrial pump system. They are wearing full PPE: hard hats, safety glasses, high-visibility vests, and steel-toed boots. One technician is holding a ruggedized tablet (back facing the camera) while pointing at a specific component on the machine, gesturing as if explaining a repair strategy. The background shows blurred conveyor belts and piping, emphasizing a busy production environment. No text or overlays in the image. High resolution, professional industrial photography style.
